trans-unit.source: powershell, cmdlet
trans-unit.target: powershell 指令程式

trans-unit.source: Invoke-Item
trans-unit.target: Invoke-Item

trans-unit.source: Invoke-Item
trans-unit.target: Invoke-Item

trans-unit.source: SYNOPSIS
trans-unit.target: 概要

trans-unit.source: Performs the default action on the specified item.
trans-unit.target: 在指定項目上執行預設動作。

trans-unit.source: SYNTAX
trans-unit.target: 語法

trans-unit.source: Path (Default)
trans-unit.target: 路徑 （預設值）

trans-unit.source: LiteralPath
trans-unit.target: 常值路徑

trans-unit.source: DESCRIPTION
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: The **Invoke-Item** cmdlet performs the default action on the specified item.
trans-unit.target: **Invoke-item** 指令程式指定的項目上執行的預設動作。

trans-unit.source: For example, it runs an executable file or opens a document file in the application associated with the document file type.
trans-unit.target: 例如，它會執行可執行檔或在與文件檔案類型相關聯的應用程式中開啟文件檔案。

trans-unit.source: The default action depends on the type of item and is determined by the Windows PowerShell provider that provides access to the data.
trans-unit.target: 預設動作需視項目類型而定，並且是由提供資料存取權的 Windows PowerShell 提供者所決定。

trans-unit.source: EXAMPLES
trans-unit.target: 範例

trans-unit.source: Example 1: Open a file
trans-unit.target: 範例 1︰ 開啟檔案

trans-unit.source: This command opens the file aliasApr04.doc in Microsoft Office Word.
trans-unit.target: 此命令使用 Microsoft Office Word 開啟 aliasApr04.doc 檔案。

trans-unit.source: In this case, opening in Word is the default action for .doc files.
trans-unit.target: 在本例中，使用 Word 開啟為 .doc 檔案的預設動作。

trans-unit.source: Example 2: Open all files of a specific type
trans-unit.target: 範例 2︰ 開啟特定類型的所有檔案

trans-unit.source: This command opens all of the Microsoft Office Excel spreadsheets in the C:\Documents and Settings\Lister\My Documents folder.
trans-unit.target: 此命令開啟 C:\Documents and Settings\Lister\My Documents 中所有的 Microsoft Office Excel 試算表。

trans-unit.source: Each spreadsheet is opened in a new instance of Excel.
trans-unit.target: 每一個試算表都會在一個新的 Excel 執行個體中開啟。

trans-unit.source: In this case, opening in Excel is the default action for .xls files.
trans-unit.target: 在本例中，使用 Excel 開啟為 .xls 檔案的預設動作。

trans-unit.source: PARAMETERS
trans-unit.target: 參數

trans-unit.source: -Confirm
trans-unit.target: -Confirm

trans-unit.source: Prompts you for confirmation before running the cmdlet.Prompts you for confirmation before running the cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 會提示您進行確認，然後再執行此指令程式。會提示您進行確認，然後再執行此指令程式。

trans-unit.source: -Credential
trans-unit.target: -Credential

trans-unit.source: Specifies a user account that has permission to perform this action.
trans-unit.target: 指定具有執行此動作權限的使用者帳戶。

trans-unit.source: The default is the current user.
trans-unit.target: 預設為目前使用者。

trans-unit.source: Type a user name, such as User01 or Domain01\User01, or enter a **PSCredential** object, such as one generated by the Get-Credential cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 輸入使用者名稱，例如 User01 或 Domain01\User01，或輸入 **PSCredential** 物件，例如 Get-credential cmdlet 產生的物件。

trans-unit.source: If you type a user name, you will be prompted for a password.
trans-unit.target: 若您輸入使用者名稱，將會提示您輸入密碼。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is not supported by any providers installed with Windows PowerShell.
trans-unit.target: 與 Windows PowerShell 一起安裝的任何提供者皆不支援此參數。

trans-unit.source: -Exclude
trans-unit.target: -排除

trans-unit.source: Specifies, as a string array, an item or items that this cmdlet excludes from the operation.
trans-unit.target: 指定為字串陣列、 項目或項目，這個指令程式排除作業。

trans-unit.source: The value of this parameter qualifies the *Path* parameter.
trans-unit.target: 此參數的值會限定 *路徑* 參數。

trans-unit.source: Enter a path element or pattern, such as *.txt.
trans-unit.target: 輸入路徑元素或模式，例如 *.txt。

trans-unit.source: Wildcards are permitted.
trans-unit.target: 允許使用萬用字元。

trans-unit.source: -Filter
trans-unit.target: 篩選器

trans-unit.source: Specifies a filter in the provider's format or language.
trans-unit.target: 以提供者的格式或語言指定篩選。

trans-unit.source: The value of this parameter qualifies the *Path* parameter.
trans-unit.target: 此參數的值會限定 *路徑* 參數。

trans-unit.source: The syntax of the filter, including the use of wildcards, depends on the provider.
trans-unit.target: 篩選的語法 (包括是否使用萬用字元) 取決於提供者。

trans-unit.source: Filters are more efficient than other parameters, because the provider applies them when retrieving the objects rather than having Windows PowerShell filter the objects after they are retrieved.
trans-unit.target: 篩選比其他參數更有效率，因為提供者會在抓取物件時套用篩選，而不是讓 Windows PowerShell 抓取物件後篩選。

trans-unit.source: -Include
trans-unit.target: -Include

trans-unit.source: Specifies, as a string array, an item or items that this cmdlet includes in the operation.
trans-unit.target: 指定為字串陣列，這個指令程式包含在作業中的項目或的項目。

trans-unit.source: The value of this parameter qualifies the *Path* parameter.
trans-unit.target: 此參數的值會限定 *路徑* 參數。

trans-unit.source: Enter a path element or pattern, such as *.txt.
trans-unit.target: 輸入路徑元素或模式，例如 *.txt。

trans-unit.source: Wildcards are permitted.
trans-unit.target: 允許使用萬用字元。

trans-unit.source: -LiteralPath
trans-unit.target: -LiteralPath

trans-unit.source: Specifies a path to the item.
trans-unit.target: 指定項目的路徑。

trans-unit.source: Unlike the *Path* parameter, the value of *LiteralPath* is used exactly as it is typed.
trans-unit.target: 不同於 *路徑* 參數、 值 *LiteralPath* 完全依照其輸入使用。

trans-unit.source: No characters are interpreted as wildcards.
trans-unit.target: 沒有字元會被視為萬用字元。

trans-unit.source: If the path includes escape characters, enclose it in single quotation marks.
trans-unit.target: 如果路徑包含逸出字元，請將它括在單引號中。

trans-unit.source: Single quotation marks tell Windows PowerShell not to interpret any characters as escape sequences.
trans-unit.target: 單引號告知 Windows PowerShell 不要將任何字元視為逸出序列。

trans-unit.source: -Path
trans-unit.target: -Path

trans-unit.source: Specifies the path to the selected item.
trans-unit.target: 指定選取項目的路徑。

trans-unit.source: -UseTransaction
trans-unit.target: -UseTransaction

trans-unit.source: Includes the command in the active transaction.
trans-unit.target: 將命令加入使用中交易。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is valid only when a transaction is in progress.
trans-unit.target: 只有交易為處理中狀態時，此參數才有效。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see Includes the command in the active transaction.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱包含使用中交易中的命令。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is valid only when a transaction is in progress.
trans-unit.target: 只有交易為處理中狀態時，此參數才有效。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱本主題中的

trans-unit.source: -WhatIf
trans-unit.target: -WhatIf

trans-unit.source: Shows what would happen if the cmdlet runs.
trans-unit.target: 顯示執行 Cmdlet 後會發生的情況。

trans-unit.source: The cmdlet is not run.Shows what would happen if the cmdlet runs.
trans-unit.target: 無法執行此指令程式。顯示執行此指令程式會發生什麼事。

trans-unit.source: The cmdlet is not run.
trans-unit.target: 未執行 Cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: CommonParameters
trans-unit.target: CommonParameters

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet supports the common parameters: -Debug, -ErrorAction, -ErrorVariable, -InformationAction, -InformationVariable, -OutVariable, -OutBuffer, -PipelineVariable, -Verbose, -WarningAction, and -WarningVariable.
trans-unit.target: 這個 cmdlet 支援一般參數:-偵錯、-ErrorAction、-ErrorVariable、-InformationAction-InformationVariable、-OutVariable、-OutBuffer、-PipelineVariable、-Verbose、-WarningAction 以及-WarningVariable。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216)。

trans-unit.source: INPUTS
trans-unit.target: 輸入

trans-unit.source: System.String
trans-unit.target: System.String

trans-unit.source: You can pipe a string that contains a path to this cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 您可以透過管道傳送字串，包含這個指令程式的路徑。

trans-unit.source: OUTPUTS
trans-unit.target: 輸出

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 無

trans-unit.source: The command does not generate any output.
trans-unit.target: 命令不會產生任何輸出。

trans-unit.source: However, output might be generated by the item that it invokes.
trans-unit.target: 但它叫用的項目可能會產生輸出。

trans-unit.source: NOTES
trans-unit.target: 附註

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet is designed to work with the data exposed by any provider.
trans-unit.target: 這個指令程式被設計來處理任何提供者公開的資料。

trans-unit.source: To list the providers available in your session, type `Get-PSProvider`.
trans-unit.target: 若要列出您的工作階段中可用的提供者，請輸入 `Get-PSProvider`。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see about_Providers.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 about_Providers。

trans-unit.source: RELATED LINKS
trans-unit.target: 相關的連結
